      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected org.springframework.hateoas.Link getPagedLink(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable, int pageNum, java.lang.String relation, java.lang.String hrefLang, java.lang.String media, java.lang.String title, java.lang.Long ownerId, java.lang.String controllerMethodName)
      This method has to be overridden to be able to receive 'controllerMethodName' as a discriminator for method from any WorkshopController<T> which should return a paged List of this WorkshopEntity<T>.

    • Method Detail

      • getPagedLink

        protected org.springframework.hateoas.Link getPagedLink(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable,
                                                        int pageNum,
                                                        java.lang.String relation,
                                                        java.lang.String hrefLang,
                                                        java.lang.String media,
                                                        java.lang.String title,
                                                        java.lang.Long ownerId,
                                                        java.lang.String controllerMethodName)
        Description copied from class: WorkshopEntitiesResourceAssemblerAbstract
        This method has to be overridden to be able to receive 'controllerMethodName' as a discriminator for method from any WorkshopController<T> which should return a paged List of this WorkshopEntity<T>. You have to build your own Link with ControllerLinkBuilder.methodOn(Class, Object...) as in the following example:

        String orderBy = pageable.getSort().iterator().next().getProperty(); String order = pageable.getSort().getOrderFor(orderBy).getDirection().name(); Link link; if (WorkshopControllerAbstract.CONTROLLER_METHOD_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(controllerMethodName)) { link = ControllerLinkBuilder.linkTo( ControllerLinkBuilder.methodOn(WorkshopControllerAbstract.class).controllerMethod( ownerId, pageable.getPageSize(), pageNum + 1, orderBy, order)) .withRel(relation).withHreflang(hrefLang).withMedia(media).withTitle(title); } else { log.error("No matching 'controllerMethodName' found for the given parameter {} in the {} for the Link to be constructed!", controllerMethodName, workshopControllerAbstractClass); return new Link("/no_link_found/"); } return link;

        Specified by:
        getPagedLink in class WorkshopEntitiesResourceAssemblerAbstract<Position>
        Parameters:
        pageable - The main info about pageable state.
        pageNum - Has to be ++pageNum as the result for the end users has to start from 1 despite inner Spring and JPA pagination starts from 0! The obligatory parameter to obtain the current number of page.
        relation - Link relation parameter.
        hrefLang - Link language.
        media - Media type of the Link.
        title - Title of the Link.
        ownerId - ID of the Owner of this collection. E.g., getUser(ownerId).getOrders()
        controllerMethodName - Discrimination string method name in order to allow to pass a needed method name and construct a custom Link according to ControllerLinkBuilder.methodOn(). As usual, it passes as static string from WorkshopController .ORDERS_CREATED_BY_METHOD_NAME.
        Returns:
        A single custom Link created according to 'controllerMethodName'.
        See Also:
        WorkshopEntitiesResourceAssemblerAbstract.getPagedLink(Pageable, int, String, String, String, String, Long, String)
